entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -24.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 12:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -24.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
